content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 plus 7 cos x"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. For what value of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> on the interval <math alttext="pi less than x less than 2 pi"><semantics><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> does <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="arccos open parentheses negative 5 over 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>arccos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="pi plus arccos open parentheses 5 over 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arccos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="pi plus arccos open parentheses negative 5 over 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arccos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>-</mi><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="2 pi minus arccos open parentheses 5 over 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mo>-</mo><mi>arccos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="pi plus arccos open parentheses 5 over 7 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>arccos</mi><mfenced><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>7</mn></mfrac></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
